name: tanned
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
past simple and past participle of
tan
having brown skin from being in the sun: He returned from his holiday looking relaxed and tanned. My legs look better when they're tanned.
More examplesFewer examplesA group of tanned blonde-haired children were playing on the beach.He complained that he was not yet tanned enough.A smile lit up her tanned face.
